named-query.name: MLoginIpAddr.findLoginIpAddrCheckFilter
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MLoginIpAddr m WHERE m.id.corpId = :corpId AND ipAddress = :ipAddress AND loginPermitStatus = :loginPermitStatus AND loginPermitTarget <> :loginPermitTarget AND delFlg = 0

named-query.name: MLoginIpAddr.findLoginIpAddrCheckFilterCorp
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MLoginIpAddr m INNER JOIN m.id WHERE m.id.corpId = :corpId AND loginPermitTarget <> :loginPermitTarget AND delFlg = 0

named-query.name: MLoginIpAddr.findLoginIpAddrCheckFilterStatus
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MLoginIpAddr m WHERE m.id.corpId = :corpId AND loginPermitStatus = :loginPermitStatus AND loginPermitTarget <> :loginPermitTarget AND delFlg = 0
